author: Ben Zimmer
title: The Journey of ‘Caravan’ From Ancient Camels to Immigrant Tensions
text:
Earlier this week, President Donald Trumptook to Twitter to lash out about U.S.-Mexican border security, warning ominously that “caravans” were coming. He was alluding to media reports of a large group of mostly Honduran migrants who were making their way across Mexico, some with the goal of continuing on to the U.S.
This “caravan” was actually an annual protest march organized by the advocacy group Pueblos Sin Fronteras (People Without Frontiers), seeking to draw attention to the plight of Central American asylum seekers....
